title: Having an issue with the store.
body:
Wanted to get a hextech shard so's that i can get a new mastery level on my chumps. 
i clearly have the IP required but it says no... I've restarted the client uninstalled the client reinstalled the client restarted my computer and still nothing D: ran the repair tool and that did  nothing but break the game with the weird graphic bug

replies.body: Hey! I was having a similar issue, I was trying to buy Twitch and it wouldn't let me. However, I did manage to fix it by going back to the legacy client, maybe that would work for you? Hopefully this helps you!

> [{quoted}](name=samarth58555,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=X7ATsOo2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-04T20:20:44.125+0000)
>
> Hey! I was having a similar issue, I was trying to buy Twitch and it wouldn't let me. However, I did manage to fix it by going back to the legacy client, maybe that would work for you? Hopefully this helps you!

D: it didn't. also i dislike you, as an adc main twitch is annoying :P

Since the common Client-switch workaround didn't work for you, you'll want to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you to resolve this for good.

Let me know if you have any questions.
